4.1 System Requirements

Hardware Requirements:

  • AMD Athlon or Pentium III System, 1 Ghz or above (otherwise CoopSim might run pretty slow)
  • 128 MB or more of memory

Software Requirements:

  • Linux or Windows 98/XP Operating System
  • Python 2.3 or above (www.python.org)
  • wxPython 2.4 or above (www.wxpython.org)


Eckhart Arnold 2006-10-14
